types:type.name: json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type json = Array<{| "order-id": String, "user-name": String, "phone-number": String, mail: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"order-id\\\":\\\"AB123\\\",\\\"user-name\\\":\\\"XYZ\\\",\\\"phone-number\\\":\\\"+91 9876543210\\\",\\\"mail\\\":\\\"test@inveniolsi.com\\\"},{\\\"order-id\\\":\\\"AB123\\\",\\\"user-name\\\":\\\"ABC\\\",\\\"phone-number\\\":\\\"+91 9876543211\\\",\\\"mail\\\":\\\"test123@inveniolsi.com\\\"}]"}
